definition: Yangxi county in Yangjiang 陽江|阳江[Yang2 jiang1], Guangdong
positive (electric.)/sun/male principle (Taoism)/Yang, opposite: 陰|阴[yin1]
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
west
the sun sets in the west (idiom)
Yangxi county in Yangjiang 陽江|阳江[Yang2 jiang1], Guangdong

sentences.english: At sunset the sky became a kaleidoscope of colors.
sentences.chinese: 夕陽西下時，天空的顏色千變萬化。

sentences.english: The sun was setting west, along with tears of someone at the edge of the world.
sentences.chinese: 夕陽西下，淚灑紅塵裏，人斷腸，在天涯。

sentences.english: When'll you return like the sun on the decline?
sentences.chinese: 但眼前的夕陽西下了，不知何時會再回來。

sentences.english: The sun was setting. It was getting dark.
sentences.chinese: 夕陽西下，天漸漸黑下來了。

sentences.english: The setting sun casts a warm glow over stream-filled valleys.
sentences.chinese: 夕陽西下，在溪流潺潺的山谷上投下一縷溫暖的光輝。

sentences.english: When the sun sets, the sky is dyed red.
sentences.chinese: 當夕陽西下之時，天際被染成了紅色。

sentences.english: A new wine cup last year old pavilions, weather. When the sunset?
sentences.chinese: 一曲新詞酒一杯，去年天氣舊亭臺。夕陽西下幾時回？

sentences.english: Setting sun west afterward, the He Chen remained don't retreat from that status.
sentences.chinese: 夕陽西下，賀宸依舊沒有從那狀態之中退出。

sentences.english: the sun is setting, soon the stars will shine upon me.
sentences.chinese: 夕陽西下，羣星馬上就會向我閃爍。

sentences.english: Take a ride at sunset on the Ferris wheel for a spectacular ocean view.
sentences.chinese: 在夕陽西下時乘在摩天輪爲一個精彩的海景。

sentences.english: The sun was setting, spilling golden lights on the low western hills.
sentences.chinese: 夕陽西下，把金色餘輝灑在矮矮的西山上。

sentences.english: The sun was setting fast, but there was still ample light.
sentences.chinese: 夕陽西下，天色很快暗下來，但是還有足夠的光線。

sentences.english: When the sun comes down, it is so nice to take a walk and breathe.
sentences.chinese: 每當夕陽西下，散散步，呼吸一下是如此的美好。

sentences.english: The sundowners campus, with the irresistible beauty.
sentences.chinese: 夕陽西下時的校園，有着不可抗拒的美麗。

sentences.english: As the sun set, the sky became suffused with a bright pink.
sentences.chinese: 夕陽西下時，天空變得紅彤彤的。

sentences.english: The sun was low in the sky and the huge chimney in the distance cast a lengthening shadow across the streets and houses.
sentences.chinese: 夕陽西下，遠處大煙囪長長的影子落在街道和房屋上。

nuée ardente/hot cloud of volcanic ash
to ride the dragon/to die (of emperors and kings)

trade wind
long-cherished wish
to miss/to yearn day and night
hearts linked as one, just as the proverbial rhinoceros communicates emotion telepathically through his single horn (idiom); fig. two hearts beat as one
pinyin: xin1 you3 ling2 xi1 yi1 dian3 tong1

definition: variant of 矇騙|蒙骗[meng1 pian4]
cups and dishes in complete disorder (idiom); after a riotous drinking party
lit. to bring a bramble and ask for punishment (idiom)/fig. to offer sb a humble apology
bird cage/(fig.) prison/confinement
lit. bleak wind and icy rain (idiom)/fig. hardships/miserable circumstances
abrupt change/sudden discontinuity
to heave a sigh of relief
